instructions.description: Bit Test with Accumulator - A ∧ M, M7 → N, M6 → V ( the immediate mode BIT operation leaves N and V in undefined state. In practice, on the WDC, they leave both unchanged.)

flags.Zero: Result of the AND operation between the accumulator and the memory if the result is Zero, Z is reset otherwise.
